data.text: “Muntie me, mo a mopɛ trenee akyi kwan;
Monhwɛ Abraham, mo agya,
Awurade bɛkyekye Sion werɛ ampa ara
“Muntie me, me nkurɔfo;
Me trenee reba ntɛm so,
Momma mo ani so nhwɛ ɔsorosoro,
“Muntie me, mo a munim nea ɛteɛ,
Na nnwewemmoa bɛwe wɔn te sɛnea wɔwe atade;
Nyan, nyan! Awurade basa,
Ɛnyɛ wo na womaa po yowee,
Wɔn a Awurade apata ama wɔn bɛsan aba.
“Me, me ara, mene wo werɛkyekyefo.
Na wo werɛ afi Awurade, wo yɛfo
Ɛrenkyɛ, wobegyaa nneduafo ahufo no;
Na mene Awurade, wo Nyankopɔn
Mede me nsɛm ahyɛ wʼanom,
Nyan, nyan!
Ne mma a ɔwoo wɔn nyinaa no
Saa ɔhaw prenu yi aba wo so,
Wo mma atotɔ beraw;
Enti tie eyi, wo a worehu amane
Sɛɛ na Otumfo Awurade se,
Mede bɛhyɛ wɔn a wɔhaw mo no nsa mu,
